channel.title: Anyone have Dark Quest source with the cool Gui?
channel.description:
I have been searching for this source for over two years for the cool GUI. I'm not sure who owns it or if it is related to the dark quest that was before rsca. Here's some vids:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Xruh_h5y5Q http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9YUwSa8Ypdg
I may be willing to offer cash (if thats legal on this forum) for the source if the real owner would come forward with a working or close to working source.

item.title: Anyone have Dark Quest source with the cool Gui?
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:11, topic:388392”][quote author=Intoxication link=topic=484214.msg3548981#msg3548981 date=1301366651]

It’s amusing how you have that signature yet here you are trying to buy a buggy-as-fuck source that was coded (bodged together) 3-4 years ago… That’s coming straight from Peeter’s mouth by the way, he didn’t have a good thing to say about it when speaking about it a few months ago.

Yeah well he looks less pathetic than you do.
[/quote]

To be fair, they’re about the same, lol. Except Kryptix has shown some success at what he does.

@OP: Learn more about the Swing library and you’ll do just about the same. All Pets did was frame it over the actual game image, nothing special. The graphics was really what caught people’s attention, that was credits to Necroth I believe.[/quote]
I guess I could take that, although we must all take into account that I’m bot actively deving rsc everyday. Just for fun. Thanks for the advice. And about Luke, I like most people don’t have a problem with him. Although if he could be nicer I think people would respect him more.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have Dark Quest source with the cool Gui?

Adu is the only one attempted which he did for fun and his own design but I am pretty sure he won’t release it. Yea it is basically moving stuff around.

yeah i saw it on the showoff thread. Looks nice
